title: Discovery & Planning
description: We start by understanding your business goals, target audience, and project requirements. I conduct thorough research and create a detailed project plan with clear milestones and deliverables.

title: Design & Architecture
description: I design the system architecture, database schema, and user interface mockups. This phase ensures we have a solid foundation before writing any code.

title: Development
description: This is where the magic happens. I build your application following best practices, writing clean and maintainable code. Regular updates keep you informed of progress.

title: Testing & Quality Assurance
description: Comprehensive testing ensures your application works flawlessly. I perform unit testing, integration testing, and user acceptance testing to catch and fix any issues.

title: Deployment & Launch
description: I deploy your application to production servers, configure domains, and ensure everything runs smoothly. Post-launch monitoring ensures stability.

title: Support & Maintenance
description: After launch, I provide ongoing support to address any issues and implement updates. I'm here to ensure your application continues to perform optimally.
